statements: SELECT * FROM GenomicData
SELECT sample_id, patient_id, gene_id, mutation_type FROM GenomicData
SELECT gene_id, sample_id, patient_id, mutation_type FROM GenomicData WHERE mutation_type = 'missense'
SELECT sample_id, patient_id FROM GenomicData WHERE gene_id = 'c6f1e4fd-07eb-4c04-8280-9fdd54cb7c34'
SELECT * FROM GenomicData ORDER BY patient_id DESC
SELECT * FROM GenomicData WHERE gene_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT sample_id, patient_id, mutation_type FROM GenomicData WHERE mutation_type = 'Missense' ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT sample_id, patient_id, gene_id, mutation_type FROM GenomicData WHERE mutation_details LIKE '%insertion%' AND mutation_type = 'Frameshift';
SELECT patient_id, gene_id, mutation_type, mutation_details FROM GenomicData WHERE patient_id = '8d4f884b-8e63-4ca4-aa5c-75dbc7f7cfb1' AND gene_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT sample_id, patient_id, gene_id FROM GenomicData WHERE patient_id = '8d4f884b-8e63-4ca4-aa5c-75dbc7f7cfb1' OR patient_id = 'c9e2dafd-1a3d-4789-a8b1-2dfe391cdc11';
SELECT * FROM patient_genetic_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, genetic_data FROM patient_genetic_data ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, result FROM analysis_results WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT analysis_id, result FROM analysis_results WHERE patient_id = 3 ORDER BY analysis_id ASC;
SELECT patient_id, genetic_data FROM patient_genetic_data WHERE patient_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM patient_genetic_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, genetic_data->'name' AS patient_name FROM patient_genetic_data WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM analysis_results ar INNER JOIN patient_genetic_data pgd ON ar.patient_id = pgd.patient_id WHERE ar.analysis_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT pgd.* FROM patient_genetic_data pgd INNER JOIN analysis_results ar ON pgd.patient_id = ar.patient_id;

SELECT ar.analysis_id, ar.result->'summary' AS analysis_summary, pgd.genetic_data->'trait' AS patient_trait FROM analysis_results ar JOIN patient_genetic_data pgd ON ar.patient_id = pgd.patient_id ORDER BY ar.analysis_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM patient_data ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM research_results WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY result_id;
SELECT patient_data.patient_name, genetic_data.gene_variant FROM patient_data JOIN genetic_data ON patient_data.patient_id = genetic_data.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE age > 40 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age;
SELECT patient_name, gender, diagnosis FROM patient_data WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%' AND age < 50;
SELECT gd.patient_id, gd.dna_sequence, rr.result_description FROM genetic_data gd INNER JOIN research_results rr ON gd.patient_id = rr.patient_id;

SELECT pd.patient_id, gd.gene_variant, rr.analysis_date, rr.result_description FROM patient_data pd INNER JOIN genetic_data gd ON pd.patient_id = gd.patient_id INNER JOIN research_results rr ON pd.patient_id = rr.patient_id WHERE gd.mutation_status = true;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, dob, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT patient_name, blood_group FROM patients WHERE blood_group IN ('A+', 'O+');
SELECT * FROM samples ORDER BY collection_date DESC;

SELECT patient_name, test_type, test_result FROM patients JOIN samples ON patients.patient_id = samples.patient_id JOIN tests ON samples.sample_id = tests.sample_id WHERE tests.test_result = 'Positive';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT patient_name, blood_group FROM patients WHERE gender = 'F' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;

SELECT patients.patient_name, samples.sample_type, tests.test_result FROM patients JOIN samples ON patients.patient_id = samples.patient_id JOIN tests ON samples.sample_id = tests.sample_id WHERE tests.test_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT patients.patient_name, tests.test_type, genetic_variants.gene_name, genetic_variants.variant_type FROM patients JOIN samples ON patients.patient_id = samples.patient_id JOIN tests ON samples.sample_id = tests.sample_id JOIN genetic_variants ON tests.test_id = genetic_variants.test_id WHERE genetic_variants.impact_score > 75 ORDER BY tests.test_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_name, blood_group FROM patients WHERE blood_group IN ('A+', 'O-') ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients
SELECT * FROM samples WHERE sample_type = 'Blood'
SELECT study_name, researcher_name FROM studies ORDER BY study_date DESC
SELECT gene_name, chromosome FROM genes WHERE gene_sequence IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT patient_name, sample_type FROM patients JOIN samples ON patients.patient_id = samples.patient_id WHERE patients.patient_id = 3;
SELECT gene_name, chromosome, gene_sequence FROM genes WHERE gene_id = 4;
SELECT study_name, researcher_name FROM studies WHERE study_date >= '2022-01-01';
